<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to provide cross application scope delete access to business capability.</description>
        <name>Capability cross scope delete access</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[try{
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
	gr.addQuery('name','cmdb_ci_business_capability');
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()){
		var deleteAccess = gr.getValue('delete_access');
		if (deleteAccess!=true){		
			gr.setValue('delete_access',true);
			gr.update();
			gs.info('Capability cross scope delete access: updated delete_access to true');
		}			
	}
}
catch (err){
	gs.info('Capability cross scope delete access Fix Script - Error: '+err);
}]]></script>
